elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: The government official Garek wants to paint a nice picture of his country and the government for the journalists.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: However, the journalists suspect that something is wrong. List observations (only outward appearances, no conversations) that make them suspicious. Refer to the following scenes.

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: During the journey:
elements.correctAnswer: Armed, young, cheerful, friendly soldiers by the wayside; description of the landscape: stone-strewn fields, dried-up riverbed, brown slopes, lime dust, blazing heat, deserted villages, colorless bushes, blast holes, ...

elements.name: Frage 3
elements.title: Arrival at Bela Bonzo:
elements.correctAnswer: old dusty gray face, lowered gaze, blackish wrinkles, puffy upper lips, neatly combed, freshly shaved (traces of blood), nicely dressed although at work
